text:
Christmas and New Year Festivities at Mandarin Oriental, Singapore
Ring in the festivities at Mandarin Oriental, Singapore and celebrate the season with a myriad of Christmas goodies, indulgent feasts and wellness experiences.
Festive Goodies
Be charmed by this year’s new and enticing Christmas Snow White, where roasted pistachio genoa meets strawberry compote, apple confit and cream cheese Normandy mousse, or the traditional Christmas Red Velvet Fruit Cake, a homemade pound cake topped with Christmas spices, butter cream and candied orange. Log cake fans certainly cannot miss the Traditional Chocolate Yule, with dark chocolate creamier, chocolate moist genoa, coated with chocolate crunch pearls, as well as The Northern Star Noel, consisting citrus Victorian sponge, wild blueberry violet compote and Madagascar vanilla mousse. The Christmas Chocolate Mixed Nuts Crunch Pie, paired with an exquisite vanilla sable tart, is also back by popular demand.
Apart from the colourful assortment of Christmas cookies, macarons, luxurious pralines,
Santa’s chocolate sleigh and boots, the Christmas spirit at Mandarin Oriental, Singapore
offers sheer delight with tantalising selections from the Christmas Roastery.
Look forward to the Traditional Roasted Christmas Turkey or Mandarin Oriental Truffle
Christmas Turkey, accompanied with sourdough stuffing of mushrooms and chestnuts,
roasted potatoes and vegetables. The Homemade Festive Foie Gras Terrine, with fig brioche, cranberry jam and onion chutney, is a luscious treat, while the succulent Honey-Glazed Bone-In Christmas Ham and Boneless Honey-Baked Christmas Ham remain the top picks.
Christmas would not be complete without an Oven-Roasted Suckling Pig or Roasted
Australian Grass-Fed Rib Eye and Homemade Mushroom Soup with Truffle Oil, with
mushroom ravioli and crisp brioche croutons. Decorate the dinner table with a yuletide
offering of Crackling Pork Knuckle, a hearty dish of roasted pumpkin and chestnuts, as well
as braised red cabbage and German bier jus. For an Oriental twist, try the Chinese Roasted
Christmas Goose, served with eight treasures glutinous rice, napa cabbage, braised black
mushrooms with chestnuts and natural jus.
Festive hampers from Mandarin Oriental, Singapore befit the season of gifting. Elegantly
presented in handmade leather boxes, four gift hampers showcase exclusive products such as Mandarin Oriental, Singapore Haute Couture Tea, French Foie Gras Mousse, Premium White Balsamic Vinegar, Black Truffle Fleur de Sal and Acacia Wildflower Honey, amongst other delightful treats.
Source:- Mandarin Oriental
